sources.title: A Passport to Hell
sources.description: Title: A Passport to Hell Summary: A notorious beautiful English woman (Myra) is kicked out of British West Africa to German West Africa, just before the start of World War I. She marries a German colonial official (Erich) ... Directed by: Frank Lloyd Actors: Elissa Landi, Paul Lukas, Warner Oland Production Company: Fox Film Corporation Release Date: 10 October 1932 (Sweden) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A notorious beautiful English woman (Myra) is kicked out of British West Africa to German West Africa, just before the start of World War I. She marries a German colonial official (Erich) to avoid internment. When Erich's father discovers her past he deports her. Before leaving, an English spy approaches her for help to escape with a vital military map. She must decide her allegiance.

metadata.Plot: A notorious beautiful English woman (Myra) is kicked out of British West Africa to German West Africa, just before the start of World War I. She marries a German colonial official (Erich) to avoid internment. When Erich's father discovers her past he deports her. Before leaving, an English spy approaches her for help to escape with a vital military map. She must decide her allegiance.
metadata.Writer: Leon Gordon, Harry Hervey, Bradley King
metadata.Actors: Elissa Landi, Paul Lukas, Warner Oland
